title: Chloe Bailey
summary: Chloe Elizabeth Bailey (born July 1, 1998), also known by her mononymous stage name Chlöe, is an American singer-songwriter, record producer, and actress. She is best known for being one half of the musical duo Chloe x Halle with her sister Halle Bailey. Together, they have released two studio albums; their sophomore album, Ungodly Hour, received widespread acclaim upon release, with many critics citing it as one of the best albums of 2020. In 2021, she debuted as a solo artist with the single "Have Mercy". Her first solo album In Pieces was released in March 2023, and its lead single "Pray It Away" was released on January 27, 2023.
